name: MICROVANIA
description:
Microvania is a love letter to Metroidvania's of extravagant size! 
Typically each room in a Metroidvania has its own screen, so we decided to have 
Only One screen!

We added additional elements to the design to justify WHY you want to see the entire castle as you progress. A dragon will swoop down and breathe fire into the castle, burning anyone in that row/column of rooms in the castle!

There are 5 secret gems hidden in the level, and multiple endings!
You must get rid of the dragon. You'll have to discover how!
